description.en:
Let's go to the offline meet-up with online gaming friends!

"MAKOTO" is a middle-aged man and newbie gamer who's excited for his offline meeting with "Ao", a veteran adventurer who has always been helping him out. However, the one who appeared for the meeting was... an elementary school boy!?

altTitles.ja: 俺の現実は恋愛ゲーム？？ ～かと思ったら命がけのゲームだった～

description.en: One day, 25-year-old Hasegawa Ryou wakes up to see a holographic screen floating in front of him. The screen prompts him to save/load files and an item shop, as well as his stats. It seems like he's been sucked into some erotic love game, since his stats depend on seducing women and "capturing" them. After finding a target and going through game-like options, Ryou thinks he knows what he has to do to "capture" his target. Surely he needs to have sex with her, right? And yet when the woman turns out to be a murderer, Ryou finds out the shocking truth: he has to capture these women and unveil their secrets! And if he fails, he dies...
description.ja: ある日、目が覚めたらそこはゲームの世界？時間を巻き戻す「セーブ」＆「ロード」や、不思議な効果を発揮するアイテムを駆使して、後ろ暗い秘密を持つ彼女たちを「攻略」せよ！
description.ru:
Однажды 25-летний Хасегава Рё просыпается и видит парящий перед ним голографический экран. На экране отображаются опции — сохранить/загрузить, магазин предметов и статистика. Похоже, что его затянуло в какую-то эроге, так как его статистика зависит от соблазнённых им женщин и их «поимки».  
  
Найдя цель и сделав несколько игровых выборов, Рё думает, что уже понял, что надо сделать, чтобы поймать цель. Конечно же, он должен заняться с ней сексом, верно? Но когда женщина оказывается убийцей, Рё узнает шокирующую правду: он должен поймать этих женщин и раскрыть их секреты! А если он потерпит неудачу… он умрет.

description.de:
Narumi ist ein Vollblut-Nerd. Doch ihre Liebe zu Manga und Anime trifft bei Normalo-Männern nicht gerade auf Verständnis – sobald sie hinter ihr Geheimnis kommen, nehmen sie Reißaus! Zum Glück bietet sich ihr alter Kindheitsfreund Hirotaka – selbst hoffnungsloser Game-Nerd – als Freund an. Aber kann die Rechnung Nerd + Nerd = Liebe wirklich aufgehen?

The Big Bang Theory trifft auf Manga – eine herrlich durchgeknallte Rom-Com nicht nur für Nerds!
description.en: Narumi Momose has had it rough: every boyfriend she’s had dumped her once they found out she was an otaku, so she’s gone to great lengths to hide it. When a chance meeting at her new job with childhood friend, fellow otaku, and now coworker Hirotaka Nifuji almost gets her secret outed at work, she comes up with a plan to make sure he never speaks up. But he comes up with a counter-proposal: why doesn’t she just date him instead? In love, there are no save points. [Kodansha]
description.es:
"Cuando me preguntan qué clase de manga es Qué difícil es el amor para un otaku, como no estoy muy segura de si es un shojo, uno romántico o un manga cómico, al final explico que es un combate de amor entre integrantes de una especie diferente."

Fujita

Él, un gamer empedernido. Ella, una fujoshi. Ambos guardan sus secretos bajo su apariencia profesional. ¿Podrán mantener una relación sin revelarlos o sin que sus pasatiempos se interpongan entre ellos?
description.fr: Narumi et Hirotaka travaillent dans la même société. Ce sont tous deux des otaku. Ils ont chacun une passion dévorante pas toujours évidente à faire entendre aux autres. Peut-elle même être compatible avec une relation amoureuse ? Comprendre l'autre, l'accepter tel qu'il est, se montrer tel qu'on est vraiment... Misant sur ce point commun, «des otaku,» ils décident alors de sortir ensemble. Mais comme dans toutes les histoires d'amours, des interrogations et des doutes persistent. Leur passion va-t-elle les rapprocher ou les séparer? Heureusement les amis sont là pour en discuter mais aussi pour partager leur «otaku attitude.»
description.id: Kisah percintaan Narumi Momose amat sulit. Dia diputuskan oleh pacarnya setelah sang pacar tahu kalau Narumi adalah fujoshi. Akhirnya dia memutuskan untuk pindah kerja dan menyembunyikan kenyataan kalau dirinya seorang otaku di kantor barunya. Tapi di tempat kerja barunya dia malah bertemu dengan Hirotaka Nifuji, teman masa kecilnya yang tampan dan terampil tapi otaku gamer kelas berat. Mendengar keluhan Narumi mengenai otaku yang tidak akan berhasil dalam cinta, Hirotaka pun mengajak Narumi berpacaran sebagai sesama otaku!? “Kalau aku pasti akan menemanimu mengumpulkan material atau naik level. Aku nggak akan mengecewakanmu atau membuatmu menangis Ditambah lagi, aku bisa membantumu berjualan di comiket akhir pekan minggu depan.
description.it:
L'amore non è un gioco. Nemmeno quando è ad alto tasso nerd.

Narumi e Hirotaka: professione impiegati e... otaku hardcore. Tenere segreta la passione per manga, anime e videogiochi può essere utile per essere considerati normali, ma legarsi a chi la condivide sarà la strada più agevole per trovare il vero amore?
description.ja: 隠れ腐女子のOL・成海(なるみ)と、ルックス良く有能だが重度のゲーヲタである宏嵩(ひろたか)とのヲタク同士の不器用な恋愛を描いたラブコメディ。『次にくるマンガ大賞2014』の〝本にして欲しいWebマンガ部門〟第1位、pixiv内オリジナルコミックブックマーク数歴代1位の大人気作品が多数の描き下ろしを加えて待望の書籍化。
description.ko:
일본 현지 420만부 돌파!
이 만화가 대단해 2016 여자편 제1위, 2018년 일본 현지 TV애니메이션 방영 확정
게임 오타쿠 X 숨덕 부녀자

숨은 부녀자인 나루미는 새로 옮긴 직장에서 잘생기고 능력 있지만 심각한 게임 오타쿠 히로타카와 재회한다. 일단 연인이 되긴 했지만 오타쿠 친구이자 서툰 두 사람에게 연애는 어렵기만 하고. 오타쿠라면 고개를 끄덕일 시추에이션 가득하다. 오타쿠가 아닌 사람이라도 피식피식 웃다가 찡 하게 눈물이 고이게 되는, 픽시브에서 연재되었던 초인기 작품이 마침내 한국 정식 발간했다.
description.pl: Narumi Momose dobrze wie, że bycie sobą nie zawsze sprawdza się w romantycznych związkach. Faceci porzucali ją już z wielu powodów. Gdy jednak jeden z nich zakończył znajomość, bo dowiedział się, że Narumi jest otaku, miarka się przebrała. Nauczona doświadczeniem, w nowej pracy nikomu nie mówi więc o swoich zainteresowaniach. Przypadek sprawia, że w tej samej firmie pracuje jej kolega z gimnazjum, a zarazem zapalony fan gier, Hirotaka Nifuji. Aby upewnić się, że jej sekret jest bezpieczny, Narumi wyciąga go na obiad i przestrzega, aby wiedzę o jej wstydliwych upodobaniach zatrzymał dla siebie. On ma jednak inną propozycję - a może by tak zostali parą?
description.pt: Apesar de Narumi Momose esconder seu gosto por histórias yaoi, seu namorado descobre tal hobby e termina o relacionamento. Para renovar sua vida, ela decide mudar de trabalho e lá acaba encontrando seu amigo de infância, Hirotaka Nifuji, um viciado em video games, que por pouco não revela o segredo de sua amiga. Então, ela decide sugerir um plano para que ele nunca mais fale sobre o assunto, mas não contava com uma contraproposta: por que não começarem a namorar? Obcecados por seus interesses pessoais, será difícil para eles manterem um relacionamento.
description.ru: Наруми — обычная офисная работница... которая втайне ото всех рисует яойную мангу. Хиротака на хорошем счету в своей компании... и в то же время он — интроверт и хардкорный геймер. Читайте историю их неуклюжей любви в романтической комедии «Так сложно любить отаку»!
description.th: นารุมิ และ ฮิโรทากะ อดีตเพื่อนสมัยเด็กที่แต่เดิมทั้งสองนั้นก็มีความชื่นชอบในวัฒนธรรมการ์ตูนและเกมอยู่แล้ว ได้กลับมาพบเจอกันอีกครั้งในฐานะเพื่อนร่วมงาน แต่ทว่าความรู้สึกบางอย่างนั้นกลับไม่เหมือนเดิม... ความสัมพันธ์ของทั้งสองจะเป็นอย่างไร จะสามารถพัฒนาจากเพื่อนสมัยเด็กกลายเป็นคนรักได้หรือไม่ นี่คือเรื่องราวความรักที่สุดแสนจะโรแมนติคคอมเมดี้ ระหว่างหนุ่มสาวโอตาคุที่กำลังเริ่มต้นขึ้น
description.uk:
Як же важко будувати стосунки отаку... Багато людей не розуміють нас і цураються, косі погляди чекають на нас практично скрізь, куди б ми не йшли. Тому що ми не такі, як оточуючі, і їх це лякає... Але ж ми теж люди і теж хочемо любові і розуміння, відчувати, що ми не самотні...

Момосе Нарумі, 26 років, отаку, раптово дізнається, що тепер працюватиме з хлопцем, якого знає з початкової школи, але з вступу до старшої вона його не бачила... Що ж принесе це їй - самотній любительці чоловічого кохання та отоме-ігор , а що йому - "фахівцеві з відеоігор" Ніфудзі Хіротаке?

Адже... так складно любити отаку...
description.es-la: ¿Puede un oficinista que es secretamente un empedernido gamer y una mujer que es en secreto una fujoshi salir sin que sus pasatiempos se entrometan en su relación o sin revelar su secreto? Para Narumi Momose no ha sido fácil encontrar pareja, cada novio la ha dejado cuando se enteran de sus aficiones, eso la ha llevado a ocultar que es una fujoshi. Pero cuando entra a su nuevo trabajo, encuentra a su amigo de la infancia Hirotaka Nifuji quien sabe de su secreta afición. Ella pensará en un plan para que no diga su secreto, pero él le hace una contrapropuesta, ¿Por qué no empiezan a salir?
description.zh-hk: 極力隱瞞自己是個腐女的粉領族‧成海，在新公司與長相帥氣又能幹，但卻是個重度電玩宅的兒時玩伴宏嵩重逢了。為了方便，提議兩人乾脆交往，於是同為阿宅的成海與宏嵩正式成為男女朋友。而公司中的另一對情侶小柳和樺倉也是阿宅，四人經常在一起喝酒聊天。作者以自己身旁的朋友為靈感，描繪出狀況不斷又有趣的阿宅戀愛故事

title.en: The Woman Who Messes With My Emotions (2022)

altTitles.ja: 情緒をめちゃくちゃにしてくる女

altTitles.ja-ro: Joucho wo Mechakuchani Shitekuru Onna

altTitles.en: A Woman Who Will Mess Up My Emotions

description.en:
Yuta was your typical introverted loser.

One day, he got invited to an IRL meeting by someone he met online with a shared interest. He wondered what kind of person will be there, and it turned out to be a beautiful lady far beyond his expectation! Yuta felt thrilled but guilty, and he was flustered at every turn.

Seeing his nervousness, she tried to draw him out of his shell...?

---

The serialized version of the original webcomic A Woman Who Will Mess Up Your Emotions.

title.en: Yabai Aidoru no Manager ni Nacchatta Hanashi

altTitles.ja: やばいアイドルのマネージャーになっちゃった話

description.en: Reluctantly becoming a manager, I was assigned to my first role managing the super popular idol, "Maron," who has a hidden side... On stage, Maron shines brightly, but in her private life, she's a caring but strange girl who can't give up smoking and requires a lot of attention. As her manager, I have to support her and keep the true face of this "perfect idol" hidden!
description.ja:
仕方なくマネージャーになって、
初めて担当する大人気アイドル「まろん」には
裏の顔があった...。

舞台上でキラキラしているまろんだが、
私生活ではタバコが手放せない、世話の焼ける変わった女の子。
「完璧なアイドル」まろんの素顔を隠し通すために、
マネージャーとしてサポートしなければ！

裏ありアイドル×世話好きマネージャー
喫煙所から始まる、二人の物語ーー。

title.en: A Mother's Love, a Daughter's Prison

altTitles.ja: 母という呪縛 娘という牢獄

altTitles.vi: Lời nguyền của mẹ - Ngục tù của con

altTitles.ja-ro: Haha to iu Jubaku Musume to iu Rougoku

description.en: The torso of a headless, limbless body is found half-buried by a riverbank. It belonged to middle-aged mother Yaeko Miyagawa, and after an investigation and trial, her daughter Hikari eventually confesses to her murder. For many years, Hikari had been subjected to physical and emotional abuse by her mother, revolving around her failure to make it into a top medical school and become a doctor. Even after nine years of futile applications and entrance exams, Yaeko refused to free her daughter from this virtual prison. What led to the fatal stabbing that ended Yaeko’s life? This series, based on a true story, will explore Hikari Miyagawa’s experiences up to her greatest tragedy—and what happened to her afterward.
description.vi:
Đây là một câu chuyện dựa trên sự việc có thật.
Một th... th... với đầu và tứ chi bị ch.t đ.ứ.t l.ì.a được phát hiện thấy bên bờ sông. Sau khi điều tra, cảnh sát đã xác minh danh tính nạn nhân là Miyagawa Yaeko, thế nhưng rúng động hơn, hung thủ gây ra vụ án dã man này không ai khác chính là Miyagawa Hikari, con gái của bị hại.
Được biết suốt thời gian qua, Miyagawa Hikari đã liên tục bị mẹ ép học hành quá mức, và đã thi trượt vào Đại học Y đến 9 lần. Thế nhưng, mẹ cô lại không hề có ý định dừng lại. Và rồi, chuyện gì đến cũng sẽ phải đến...

altTitles.en: Captain Tsubasa: Road to 2002 - Go for 2006

altTitles.ja: キャプテン翼　ROAD　TO　2002

description.en:
After the World Youth, Japanese players are looking for pro careers in Japan and around the world.  
  
In order to fulfill their dream of World Cup 2002 in Korea and Japan, they must get stronger playing in various club competitions, home and abroad.

altTitles.ja: 深潭回廊

description.en:
He was a teacher who knew his student was gay and still desired his body.
After running away from everything, he became a wanderer and took the name Mos-san.

Yanagida struggled with the pain of being in love with the same sex. 
He committed attempted rape on a student when he was a teacher, and ran away from there. 
Before he knew it he had become Mos, a pitiful demon who had thrown his past away, but had no choice but to keep on living. 
He thought he'd lost everything but a single boy reached out his hand to him.

Seven years have passed since the painful but passionate story of 'Smells Like Green Spirit.'

title.en: Tsuihousareta Renkinjutsushi wa Mujikaku ni Densetsu to Naru Yandere Imouto (Oukoku no Shugoryuu) to Issho ni Henkyou de Shiawase ni Kurashimasu!

altTitles.ja: 追放された錬金術師は無自覚に伝説となる ヤンデレ妹（王国の守護竜）と一緒に辺境で幸せに暮らします！

altTitles.en: The Exiled Alchemist Unwittingly Becomes a Legend Living Happily on the Frontier with his Yandere Sister (The Guardian Dragon of the Kingdom)!

description.en:
One day, Mys, the eldest son of Duke Windsor, is sentenced by the king to be exiled to the border. The king claims that his secret visit to Valitra, the strongest dragon that protects the kingdom, is an attempt at treason against the kingdom. However, Valitra's guardian dragon is actually Mys' younger sister, Tinny, who was thought to have died four years ago! 

"Mys Nii-sama is the one who saved my life, the one who is worthy to rule everything in the world [Supreme Being]. Anyone who hurts Mys Nii-sama will be thrown into hell!" 

And the Kingdom is heading towards destruction, having incurred the wrath of its guardian dragon, Valitra... Meanwhile, on the border where Mys has become the ruler, his alchemy techniques are leading to unprecedented developments and making everyone happy - and once again, the kingdom is in danger of destruction.
description.id: Suatu hari, Mys, putra tertua dari Duke Windsor, dijatuhi hukuman oleh raja untuk diasingkan ke perbatasan. Raja mengklaim bahwa kunjungan rahasianya ke Valitra, naga terkuat yang melindungi kerajaan, merupakan usaha pengkhianatan terhadap kerajaan. Namun, naga penjaga Valitra sebenarnya adalah adiknya Meis, Tinny, yang dikira telah meninggal empat tahun lalu! “Mys Nii-sama adalah orang yang menyelamatkan hidupku, orang yang layak untuk memerintah segala sesuatu di dunia [Makhluk Tertinggi]. Siapapun yang menyakiti Mys Nii-sama akan ku lemparkan ke dalam neraka!” Dan Kerajaan sedang menuju kehancuran, setelah menimbulkan kemarahan naga pelindungnya, Valitra… Sementara itu, di perbatasan di mana Mys telah menjadi penguasa, teknik alkemisnya mengarah pada perkembangan yang belum pernah terjadi sebelumnya dan membuat semua orang bahagia – dan sekali lagi, kerajaan berada dalam bahaya kehancuran.
description.ja: まともな回復薬すら作れないことから、家族から無能扱いされていたウィンザー公爵家の長男・マイス。彼はある日、国王から辺境ベオグラードへの追放を言い渡されてしまう。王国を守るドラゴン【守護竜ヴァリトラ】のもとへ通っていたことが、王国への反逆に当たるというのだ。しかし実は、守護竜ヴァリトラの正体は4年前に死んだと思われていたマイスの妹ティニーであった――。「マイス兄様こそ私の命の恩人にして、この世のすべてを統べるに相応しい【至高にして至大であられるお方】です。マイス兄様を傷つける者は、この私が地獄に叩き落します！」

title.en: Uchi ni Kaeru to Itsumo Kukkoro ga Iru

altTitles.ja: 家に帰るといつもくっころが居る

altTitles.id: Saat Pulang ke Rumah, Selalu Ada Kucing yang Ada di Sana.

description.en: A high school student planning to live alone decides to rent a "stigmatized property" where the ghost of a female knight appears!

altTitles.ja: 無法島

description.en: A prequel to Jisatsutou. The Japanese government exiles convicts facing execution to a remote lawless island to fend for themselves.

Zhou Mingrui possessed and reborn Klein Moretti, who committed suicide because of the sealed object "Antigonus Family Notes". In order to return to Earth, Zhou Mingrui held the "transfer ceremony" again, but accidentally entered a mysterious gray fog space, during which he inadvertently pulled the
consciousness of Audrey Hall and Alger Wilson into the gray fog space. In order to take the lead in the conversation, he disguised himself as a hidden existence in recovery, calling himself "Mr. Fool" and began a magnificent legend of becoming a god.
description.pt-br: Zhou Mingrui possuía e renasceu como Klein Moretti, que cometeu suicídio por causa do objeto selado 'Notas da Família Antigonus'. Para retornar à Terra, Zhou Mingrui realizou novamente a 'cerimônia de transferência', mas acidentalmente entrou em um misterioso espaço de névoa cinza, durante o qual, sem querer, puxou as consciências de Audrey Hall e Alger Wilson para o espaço da névoa cinza. Para assumir o controle da conversa, ele se disfarçou como uma existência oculta em recuperação, chamando a si mesmo de 'Sr. Tolo' e iniciou uma magnífica lenda de se tornar um deus.

title.en: Intai Shita Ossan Kenja da ga Manadeshi ga Tsuihou Sarete Kita no de Shoushin Ryokou ni Tsureteiku ~Slow Life na Tabi no Tsumori ga, Nazeka Sekai Saikyou no Shitei ni Natteita~

altTitles.ja: 引退したおっさん賢者だが愛弟子が追放されてきたので傷心旅行に連れて行く ～スローライフな旅のつもりが、なぜか世界最強の師弟になっていた〜

altTitles.ja-ro: Intaishita Ossan Kenjada ga Manadeshi ga Tsuihou Sarete Kita no de Shoushin Ryokou ni Tsureteiku ~Surouraifu na Tabi no Tsumori ga, Nazeka Sekai Saikyou no Shitei ni Natte Ita~

altTitles.en: A Retired Old Sage Takes His Disciple on a Journey

He Is a Retired Old Sage, but His Beloved Disciple Has Been Expelled, So He Takes Her on a Heartbreak Trip ~He Intended to Travel in a Slow Life Fashion, but for Some Reason He Ended Up Becoming the World's Strongest Master and Disciple.~

altTitles.id: Seorang Sage Tua Yang Sudah Pensiun Mengajak Muridnya Dalam Sebuah Perjalanan

description.en:
"Shall we go on an adventure, like in the old days?"

Although he was an orphan, Roge trained hard and became known as the “Sage.” His beloved student, Liliane, suddenly came to visit him. 

"Roge-sensei… I… have been expelled." 

Liliane has been employed as a royal court mage, but after being exhausted by the harsh working environment and shady human relationships, she was fired without being told why. In an attempt to heal her exhausted heart, Roge invites her on an adventure to relieve her heartbreak. 

"Sensei, I want to travel with you, to relive those bright days once again!" 

And so begins a slow-pace journey, following the paths they once travelled together, but the two, who are both too talented for their own good, end up leaving legends behind in every place they went…

description.en: More than ten years have passed since a means of transporting individuals from Earth to another world was developed. High school student Kakeru Satomi was taught survival techniques and wisdom by his mountain-dwelling grandfather. Kakeru was sent to another world together with 100 other adventurers of the same age in order to take part in a training program to become an adventurer, but the portal device that linked Earth and the other world vanished right after their transfer...!
description.ja:
地球から異世界への転移装置が誕生して10余年――。里見カケルは、山で暮らす祖父から叩き込まれたサバイバル知識とスキルを持った高校生。冒険者になるための研修に参加するため、同世代の冒険者志願者100人とともに異世界へと転移したカケルだったが、直後に地球と異世界を繋いでいたポータルが消失してしまう…！！
___
- ![Syosetsu+18](<https://i.imgur.com/HI4jAzg.png>) [Web Novel (R18)](https://novel18.syosetu.com/n7758hj/)

description.en:
The stage; a city where "witches" collect people's worship. Who appeared there was a man carrying a coffin, and a girl with a beast's eyes. Their prey, "Witches"! And nothing else. When the evil "witch" and the starved "beast" meet, their magnificent and fierce battle begins!

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10214/episode/314025) (U.S. Only), [Kodansha](https://kodansha.us/series/the-witch-and-the-beast/)
description.ja: 舞台は“魔女”が人々の崇拝を集める街――。そこに現れたのは、棺桶を背負う男と、獣の目をした少女。彼等の求める獲物は“魔女”、そのただ一つ。悪しき“魔女”と飢えた“野獣”が出会う時、華麗にして苛烈な戦いの幕が開く！
description.vi:
Ashaf là một anh chàng tao nhã với tác phong tinh tế, mang theo quan tài và đoàn tùy tùng quạ đen. Còn Guideau lại là một cô gái hoang dại, đầy bạo lực, với cặp răng nanh và đôi mắt như loài dã thú.
Bỗng một ngày, bộ đôi kỳ lạ này đặt chân đến thành phố bị thống trị bởi phù thủy - người được tung hô như một vị anh hùng nơi đây. Nhưng cả Ashaf và Guideau đều biết rõ: "Phù thủy là những kẻ mang đến sự nguyền rủa và tai ương". Không một ai có thể cản bước họ, dù có là đám đông phẫn nộ hay là cả một đội quân đi chăng nữa...
Một câu chuyện cổ tích u ám mang phong cách Steampunk & Gothic, đậm đà chất ma thuật! "Phù thủy và Quái thú" chắc chắn sẽ lôi cuốn bất cứ độc giả nào đang ngóng chờ một tựa truyện thể loại hành động và kỳ ảo mới toanh.

The sudden appearance of the amnesiac witch, Nyx, has brought a lot of changes to Ren Xi’s life. The two help each other’s growth, Ren Xi’s willing to help Nyx to find her lost memories, but in the process, will discover an astonishing secret……  
  
L'apparition soudaine d'une sorcière amnésique, Nix, amène beaucoup de changements dans la vie du jeune Ren Xi. Ren Xi veut aider Nix à retrouver ses souvenirs. Cette quête leur fera découvrir un secret incroyable…

description.en: That day, Ishida Yamada was working his part-time job as usual. After finishing his shift, he opened the back door and stepped into a vast, empty space, where he encountered a mysterious figure claiming to be God. By sheer chance, Ishida was chosen by this God to be transported to another world. Although confused and uncertain, he resolved to adapt and make a life for himself in this strange new place. Using the skills granted by God, he focused on surviving and thriving. As he explored different lands and encountered various races, he made it his mission to form close relationships with many beautiful women along the way.
description.ja: その日も山田一太はいつもと変わらずバイトをしていた。バイトが終わり裏口の扉を開けると、そこには真っ白な空間が広がっていて、神と名乗る者がいた。 一太は偶然神によって選ばれ、異世界に行くことになった。一太は戸惑いながらも、取り合えず生きていこうと決めた。 神からもらったスキルを使って如何にこの異世界を生き抜くか考えながら、一太はこの異世界にいる美女と肉体関係を持つために色々と頑張っていく。
description.es-la: Ese día, Ichita Yamada estaba trabajando medio tiempo como de costumbre. Cuando abrió la puerta trasera después de terminar su trabajo de medio tiempo, encontró un espacio en blanco y una persona que se hacía llamar Dios. Fue por casualidad que Dios lo eligió para ir a otro mundo. Estaba perplejo, pero decidió vivir de todos modos. Pensando en cómo sobrevivir en este otro mundo usando las habilidades que recibió de Dios, hace todo lo posible por tener una relación física con una mujer hermosa en este otro mundo.
description.pt-br: Naquele dia, Ishida Yamada estava trabalhando meio período, como sempre. Ao abrir a porta dos fundos após terminar seu trabalho de meio período, ele encontrou um espaço em branco e uma pessoa que se autodenominava Deus. Foi por acaso que ele foi escolhido por Deus para ir para outro mundo. Ele ficou perplexo, mas decidiu viver mesmo assim. Pensando em como sobreviver neste outro mundo usando as habilidades que recebeu de Deus, ele tenta ao máximo ter um relacionamento físico com uma linda mulher neste outro mundo.

altTitles.ja-ro: Ooku no Ki no Shita

description.cs:
Láska je rozprávka. Alebo je? Koktavá dáma Maxi - najstaršia dcéra rodiny Croysovcov, vyrastá zneužívaná svojím otcom je nakoniec donútená vstúpiť do manželstva s rytierom Riftanom. Novomanželia spolu strávia prvú noc, po ktorej okamžite Riftan odchádza na výpravu. O tri roky neskôr sa triumfálne vracia ako slávny rytier. Všetky rozprávky sa končia svadbou a šťastným osudom. Ich láska sa začala svadbou - toto nie je rozprávka. Aké sú Riftanove zámery? Nájde Maxi silu prekonať svoju traumu a nedostatok sebadôvery? Prežije dvojica a nájde lásku napriek všetkým prekážkam?

---

description.en:
The daughter of a duke, the stuttering Maximilian, married a knight of lowly status at her father’s coercion. After their first night, her husband departed for an expedition without another word. He came back three years later, this time as a famous knight in the whole continent. How will Maximilian face him on his return?

"The more I think of you, the more lonely and lonely I become. I don't know why I can't quit even though it's so painful."

---
A flawless love story of the flawed. Stuttering lady Maximilian is forced into a marriage with Sir Riftan, but he leaves on a campaign after their wedding night. Three years later, he triumphantly returns, ready to cherish her. As life with her husband finally begins, she only has one question — does she deserve this love and happiness?

La figlia di un duca, la balbettante e insicura Maxine, sposò un cavaliere di umile condizione per la coercizione del padre. Dopo la loro prima notte, suo marito partì per una spedizione senza aggiungere altro. Tornò tre anni dopo, questa volta come famoso cavaliere in tutto il continente. Come l'affronterà Maxine al suo ritorno? "Più penso a te, più mi sento solo e vuoto. Non so perché, ma non riesco a smettere di pensarti anche se è così doloroso."

말더듬이 공작 영애 맥시밀리언은
아버지의 강요로 비천한 출생의 기사와 결혼하게 된다.
첫날밤을 치르고 원정을 떠나간 남편은
3년 후, 전 대륙에 명성을 떨치는 기사가 되어 돌아오는데….

Как же теперь Максимилиана встретит его?

“แม็กซิมิเลียน” ลูกสาวของดยุคผู้พูกติดอ่างถูกบังคับให้แต่งงานกับอัศวินที่ไร้ซึ่งยศถาบรรดาศักดิ์ “ริฟแทน” เพียงแค่คืนเดียวหลังวันแต่งงานริฟแทนก็ได้ออกเดินทางเพื่อทำศึกโดยไร้ซึ่งคำบอกกล่าวใด ๆ เมื่อเวลาผ่านไป3ปี เขาได้กลับมาพร้อมกับชัยชนะในฐานะของอัศวินผู้มีชื่อเสียงของอาณาจักร แล้วทีนี้แม็กซิมิเลียนจะเผชิญหน้ากับการกลับมาของเขาได้อย่างไร? "ยิ่งคิดถึงคุณเท่าไหร่ ฉันก็ยิ่งรู้สึกเหงาและเหงามากขึ้นเท่านั้น ฉันไม่รู้ว่าทำไมถึงไม่หยุดคิดเสียที แม้ว่ามันจะเจ็บปวดมาก็ตาม"

Дочка герцога, заїка Максимілліан, через свого батька, насильно вийшла заміж за лицаря низького статусу. Після першої шлюбної ночі, він не проронивши ні слова відправився на експедицію. Після якої повернувся вже відомим на всьому континенті Майстром мечу. Як Максимілліан зустріне його?

description.en: Yura Hwang is an actress who only gets to act as an extra for all seven years since she started her career. She got betrayed by her boyfriend that got married to another person. But in all that mess, she met again with the famous senior actor for the second time in her newest movie! Will her path to becoming a star come true?
description.pl: Yura Hwang, aktorka, która przez siedem lat, odkąd rozpoczęła karierę, występuje tylko jako statystka. Została zdradzona przez swojego chłopaka, który wziął ślub z inną dziewczyną. W całym tym chaosie, udało jej się spotkać ze słynnym aktorem w swoim najnowszym filmie! Czy jej droga do zostania gwiazdą się spełni?

description.de:
Als sich vor zehn Jahren das „Gate“ öffnete und unsere Welt sich mit der von Monstern verband, erhielten einige normale Menschen die Macht, diese Monster zu jagen. Sie sind als die „Hunter“ bekannt. Doch nicht alle Hunter sind mächtig. Mein Name ist Jin-Woo Sung, ich bin ein Hunter mit Rang E. Ich bin ein Hunter, der selbst in den einfachsten Dungeons sein Leben riskieren muss, der „weltschwächste“. Da ich keine einzige, hervorstechende Fähigkeit habe, schaffte ich es kaum, das nötige Geld für den Zutritt zu den schwächsten Dungeons zu verdienen … jedenfalls, bis ich in einem Rang D Dungeon einen versteckten Dungeon mit der höchstmöglichen Schwierigkeit fand! Als ich dort letztendlich meinen Tod akzeptiert hatte, erhielt ich eine seltsame Macht, einen Questlog, den nur ich sehen konnte, ein Geheimnis, mit dem ich mein Level steigern konnte! Wenn ich die Quests erfülle und basierend auf den gestellten Aufgaben trainiere und Monster jage, steigt mein Level. Ich werde vom weltschwächsten Hunter zum stärksten Rang S Hunter! 


- [Book <German Edition>](https://altraverse.de/manga/solo-leveling/)

- [<German Edition>](https://altraverse.de/manga/solo-leveling/)
description.en:
10 years ago, after “the Gate” that connected the real world with the monster world opened, some of the ordinary, everyday people received the power to hunt monsters within the Gate. They are known as “Hunters”. However, not all Hunters are powerful. My name is Sung Jin-Woo, an E-rank Hunter. I’m someone who has to risk his life in the lowliest of dungeons, the “World’s Weakest”. Having no skills whatsoever to display, I barely earned the required money by fighting in low-leveled dungeons… at least until I found a hidden dungeon with the hardest difficulty within the D-rank dungeons! In the end, as I was accepting death, I suddenly received a strange power, a quest log that only I could see, a secret to leveling up that only I know about! If I trained in accordance with my quests and hunted monsters, my level would rise. Changing from the weakest Hunter to the strongest S-rank Hunter!

---
**Links:**

- Official English Translation [<Pocket Comics>](https://www.pocketcomics.com/comic/320) | [<WebNovel>](https://www.webnovel.com/comic/only-i-level-up-(solo-leveling)_15227640605485101) | [<Tapas>](https://tapas.io/series/solo-leveling-comic/info)
- Alternate Official Raw - [Kakao Webtoon](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/나-혼자만-레벨업/2320)
description.fr:
Lorsque d’étranges portails sont apparus aux quatre coins du monde, l’humanité a dû trouver parade pour ne pas finir massacrée entre les griffes des monstres qu’ils ont apportés avec eux. La solution ? Les chasseurs ! Ces combattants intrépides n’hésitent pas à foncer au cœur des donjons dimensionnels pour combattre les créatures qu’ils abritent, et y collecter des trésors.

description.id:
Dunia diserang monster! Muncullah "hunter" untuk menyerang monster-monster itu. Di kalangan hunter, ada yang disebut hunter terlemah di dunia. Itulah julukan Seong Jinwoo. Masuk rumah sakit adalah kebiasaannya setelah masuk ke dungeon. Suatu hari, saat melakukan raid, suatu peristiwa tragis menimpanya. Peristiwa itu hampir merenggut nyawanya. Namun, saat tersadar, dia mendapati dirinya masih hidup dan melihat sesuatu yang tidak bisa dilihat orang lain. Sejak saat itu, kehidupan Seong Jinwoo berubah. Inilah perjalanan Seong Jinwoo untuk menjadi hunter terkuat di dunia!

description.it:
10 anni fa, dopo l'apertura di “Portali” che connettono il mondo reale con quello dei mostri, gente comune ha ricevuto il potere di cacciare i mostri all'interno dei Portali. Sono conosciuti come "Hunter". Tuttavia, non tutti gli Hunter sono potenti. Il mio nome è Sung Jin-Woo, un Hunter di grado E, il "più debole al mondo". Senza particolari abilità a mia disposizione, guadagno la mia paga combattendo in dungeon di basso livello… Almeno finché non ho trovato un dungeon della massima difficoltà nascosto in un dungeon di grado D! Alla fine, mentre mi accingevo ad accettare la morte, ho ricevuto uno strano potere, un'interfaccia per le missioni che solo io posso vedere, un segreto per aumentare di livello di cui solo io sono a conoscenza! La trasformazione dal più debole al più forte Hunter di grado S!

description.ja:
十数年前、異次元と現世界を結ぶ通路”ゲート”というものが現れてからハンターと呼ばれる覚醒者たちが出現した。 ハンターはゲート内のダンジョンに潜むモンスターを倒し対価を得る人たちだ。しかし全てのハンターが強者とは限らない。 人類最弱兵器と呼ばれるE級ハンター「水篠　旬」 母親の病院代を稼ぐため嫌々ながらハンターを続けている。 ある日、D級ダンジョンに隠された高難易度の二重ダンジョンに遭遇した「旬」は死の直前に特別な能力を授かる。 「旬」にだけ見えるデイリークエストウィンドウ…！？ 「旬」ひとりだけが知ってるレベルアップの秘密… 毎日届くクエストをクリアし、モンスターを倒せばレベルアップする…！？ 果たして「旬」ひとりのレベルアップはどこまで続くのかーー！！

description.ka: E-კლასის მონადირე ჯინვუ სუნგი ყველაზე სუსტია. ყველა ზემოდან უყურებს, მას არც ფული აქვს, არც სხვა სამუშაო პერსპექტივა. ასე რომ, როდესაც მისი პარტია იპოვის დამალულ დუნგეონს, ის გადაწყვეტს გამოიყენოს ეს შანსი თავისი ცხოვრების უკეთესობისკენ შესაცვლელად… მაგრამ ის შესაძლებლობა, რომელსაც ის აღმოაჩენს, ოდნავ განსხვავდება იმისგან, რაც მას ჰქონდა მხედველობაში…
description.ko:
10여 년 전, 
다른 차원과 이쪽 세계를 이어 주는 통로 ‘게이트’가 열리고 
평범한 이들 중 각성한 자들이 생겨났다.

게이트 안의 던전에서 마물을 사냥하는 각성자.
그들을 일컬어 ‘헌터’라 부른다.

그러나 모든 헌터가 강한 것은 아니다.

내 이름은 성진우.
E급 헌터다. 

저급 던전에서조차 죽을 고비를 넘겨야 하는
‘인류 최약병기’. 

무엇 하나 내세울 것 없는 형편에
저급 던전으로 근근이 생계를 이어가던 그는,
D급 던전 속에 숨겨진 
최악의 난이도의 이중 던전을 만난다.

그리고 결국… 죽음을 맞이하려던 순간,
그는 기이한 능력을 얻게 된다. 

오직 그에게만 보이는 게임 퀘스트 창!
오직 그만이 알게 된 레벨 업의 비밀!

퀘스트를 따라 수련하고
몬스터를 사냥하면 레벨이 오른다.
오직 그 혼자만! 


최약체 헌터에서 최강 헌터로 각성하다!

추공 작가의 인기 판무 소설 <나 혼자만 레벨업>이
웹툰으로 드디어 등장!

description.pl:
Dziesięć lat temu otworzyły się wrota łączące inne światy z naszym. Krótko po tym pojawili się Łowcy, osoby dysponujące mocą by móc walczyć wewnątrz wrót. Historia nasza skupia się na Sung Jin-woo, który jest łowcą rangi-E, nazywanym najsłabszym łowcą. Po incydencie z podwójnym lochem będąc bliskim śmierci zyskuje on nadludzką siłę i jako jedyny może zdobywać doświadczenie by stać się silniejszym. Od najsłabszego do najsilniejszego.

description.ru:
10 лет назад, после того, как открылись «Врата», соединившие реальный мир с параллельным, некоторые из людей получили силу охотиться на монстров внутри «Врат». Они известны как «Охотники». Однако не все Охотники сильные. Меня зовут Сун Джин-Ву, охотник E-ранга. Я тот, кто рискует своей жизнью в самых низких уровнях подземелья. Не имея никаких сверхсильных навыков, я едва зарабатывал необходимые деньги, сражаясь в низкоуровневых подземельях... по крайней мере, пока я не нашел скрытое подземелье с самыми трудными проблемами в подземельях D-ранга! В конце концов, когда я чуть не умер, я внезапно получил странную силу, журнал квестов, который мог видеть только я, секрет для поднятия уровня, о котором знаю только я! Если я тренировался в соответствии с моими квестами и охотился на монстров, то мой уровень повышался. Переход от самого слабого Охотника к самому сильному, Охотнику S-ранга!

description.th:
10 ปีก่อน 'เกต' ที่พาทะลุสู่อีกมิติหนึ่งได้เปิดขึ้น ภายในเกตมีมอนสเตอร์ตัวร้ายที่เหล่าผู้คนที่ถูกปลุกพลังจะต้องกำราบ 
คนเหล่านั้นได้รับการขนานนามว่า 'ฮันเตอร์' แต่ทว่า ไม่ใช่ฮันเตอร์ทุกคนที่จะแข็งแกร่ง
ซองจินอู ผู้ได้รับฉายาว่าเป็นอาวุธที่กากที่สุดในมวลมนุษยชาติ คือฮันเตอร์แรงค์ E ที่แม้กระทั่งในดันเจี้ยนแรงค์ต่ำๆ ชีวิตเขาก็ยังแขวนบนเส้นด้าย
แต่หลังจากที่ได้เข้าไปในดับเบิลดันเจี้ยนและรอดชีวิตกลับมา เขาก็เปลี่ยนไป
จากฮันเตอร์ที่กากที่สุด เขาจะกลายเป็นผู้ที่แกร่งที่สุด!

description.es-la: Sung Jinwoo es un cazador de rango E, considerado como el nivel más bajo dentro de la Asociación de cazadores, por lo que se le conoce como “El cazador más débil”. Día tras día pone en peligro su vida y se embarca en misiones del rango más bajo para poder sufragar los gastos de su madre enferma; sin embargo, en una de esas misiones, lo que en un principio parecía un raid de rango D termina por ser una mazmorra de un nivel inusitado y las cosas empiezan a torcerse… ¿Lograrán Sung y sus compañeros salir con vida?
description.pt-br:
Dez anos atrás, depois do "Portal" que conecta o mundo real com um mundo de montros se abriu, algumas pessoas comuns receberam o poder de caçar os monstros do portal. Eles são conhecidos como caçadores. Porém, nem todos os caçadores são fortes. Meu nome é Sung Jin-Woo, um caçador de rank E. Eu sou alguém que tem que arriscar a própria vida nas dungeons mais fracas, "O mais fraco do mundo". Sem ter nenhuma habilidade à disposição, eu mal consigo dinheiro nas dungeons de baixo nível… Ao menos até eu encontrar uma dungeon escondida com a maior dificuldade dentro do Rank D! No fim, enquanto aceitava minha morte, eu ganhei um novo poder…

連接異次元與這個世界的通道「傳送門」，

altTitles.zh-hk: 已經習慣一個人了。訂婚對象放置中！

altTitles.zh: 已经习惯一个人了。订婚对象放置中！

description.en: Countess Nicole's fiancé, Chaos, is always by his childhood friend, Princess Caroline's side. As a result of being constantly neglected by Chaos, Nicole has awakened to the idea of ​​being alone, thinking, "If that's what he likes, then I should do what I like too!"...? While Nicole has discovered the ease of being alone, Chaos, on the other hand, doesn't seem to understand the seriousness of the situation...? The long-awaited comic adaptation of the slapstick love comedy of Chaos and Nicole, whose mutual unrequited love has become complicated!

title.en: If the Villainess and Villain Met and Fell in Love

altTitles.ja: 悪役令嬢と悪役令息が、出逢って恋に落ちたなら
悪役令嬢と悪役令息が、出逢って恋に落ちたなら　～名無しの精霊と契約して追い出された令嬢は、今日も令息と競い合っているようです～

altTitles.ja-ro: Akuyaku Reijou to Akuyaku Reisoku ga, Deatte Koi ni Ochitanara: Nanashi no Seirei to Keiyaku shite Oidasareta Reijou wa, Kyou mo Reisoku to Kisoiatte Iru you desu

altTitles.en: If the Villainess and the Villain Were to Meet and Fall in Love: It Seems the Shunned Heroine Who Formed a Contract With an Unnamed Spirit Is Fighting With the Nobleman Yet Again

altTitles.ja-ro: Akuyaku Reijou to Akuyaku Reisoku ga, Deatte Koi ni Ochitanara

altTitles.vi: Nàng phản diện phải lòng chàng ác nhân

description.en:
Despite being from a prestigious noble family, Bridget, a failed daughter who made a contract with the weakest spirit, one day had her engagement broken off by the third prince, Joseph.

However, no one sympathized with her, who was acting as a proud daughter at the behest of Joseph... At that time, Bridget meets the Duke's son Yuri, who is feared by those around him because of his overwhelming ability and cold personality.

Two people who hate each other and repel each other. However, the encounter gradually changes their destinies. This is the story of a villainess who is despised for being incompetent and a villain who is shunned for being a genius who eventually fall in love.

---
Despite her noble status, Brigitte contracts with the weakest type of spirit—and on that very same day, the prince publicly breaks off their engagement. No one shows much sympathy towards the once haughty young lady—except for the duke's son, Yuri, who attends the same magic academy. Yuri is feared for his incredible abilities and icy personality, but with him on her side, her fortunes might have changed…

---
**Original Web Novel:** [Kakuyomu](https://kakuyomu.jp/works/16816700426830814673), [Syosetu](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n9923hb/)
description.ja: 幼い頃に最弱精霊と契約してしまった落ちこぼれ令嬢ブリジット。ある日、第三王子から婚約破棄を言い渡され、絶望の淵に立たされる。そんな中、彼女は孤高の天才令息ユーリと遭遇する。嫌われ者同士いがみ合う二人であったが、この出逢いが運命を動かすこととなり――。

title.en: For You, I’ll Dress up in a Lie

altTitles.ja: 君のためにボクは嘘を着飾る

altTitles.ja-ro: Kimi no Tame ni Boku wa Uso wo Kikazaru

description.en: Kokuyou Yuzuru, a bit of a plain boy, is always together with his best friend from childhood, Shiratama Kotaro. They thought they could stay together forever even after they entered middle school... One day, something happens that changes their relationship drastically.
description.ja:
ちょっぴり地味な男子「黒曜結弦」は親友の幼馴染「白玉小太郎」といつも一緒。
中学生になってもずっと一緒にいられると思ったのに…。
ある日二人の関係を大きく変える出来事が起きる。

title.en: Ore wa Seikan Kokka no Akutoku Ryoshu

altTitles.ja: 俺は星間国家の悪徳領主

altTitles.en: I'm the Evil Lord of an Intergalactic Empire!

altTitles.pt-br: Eu sou o Lorde Vilão da Nação Interestelar

altTitles.id: Aku adalah Penguasa Jahat dari Kekaisaran Antargalaksi!

altTitles.ja-ro: Ore wa Seikan Kokka no Akutoku Ryoshu

altTitles.vi: Ta Là Chúa Tể Của Đế Chế Liên Ngân Hà

description.en:
In his past life, Liam was hardworking and honest. This got him nothing but debt and betrayal. Now he’s been reborn as the ruling noble of a planet.

Time for some payback.

This life he’ll grind the world under his heel! He’s only looking out for himself. All his underlings will suffer! But try as he might, his tyranny only seems to make his subjects happier.
description.id:
Liam sera banfield adalah reincarnator. dia bereinkarnasi di dunia fantasy pedang dan sihir. Tapi pada saat peradaban sudah siap membuat kemajuan ke luar angkasa, ceritanya terjadi di sebuah kerajaan antar galaksi, sebuah universitas seperti opera ruang angkasa di mana senjata humanoid dan pesawat ruang angkasa saling melengkapi. Liam, yang telah menjelma menjadi keluarga bangsawan dalam masyarakat monarki. memiliki ambisi untuk suatu hari menjadi raja jahat di kehidupan sebelumnya. sayangnya Liam telah kehilangan segalanya dan mati dalam keputusasaan. 

"sangat bodoh hidup untuk orang lain."
 "Aku akan hidup untuk diriku sendiri"

 ia mulai menuju kehidupan keduanya, tetapi malah disembah sebagai penguasa yang berbudi luhur karena perbedaan nilainya. Akankah Liam dapat dengan aman menjadi tuan yang jahat?
description.ja:
星間国家アルグランド帝国の辺境惑星を治める伯爵家に転生し、幼くして領主となったリアム・セラ・バンフィールド。持ち前の善良さ故に、妻や会社に裏切られた前世の反省から今世では“奪う側”として生きると決意する――

「悪徳領主になって、悪の限りを尽くす！」

だが、受け継いだ領地は虐げるまでもない寂れっぷりで……止む無くリアムは自領の建て直しから着手することに。人工知能を重用！ 宇宙艦隊を縮小！ 不正貴族を一刀両断！常識など無視して思うがまま傍若無人に振る舞うのだが、結果的に領民は豊かになり、好感度がうなぎ登りで……!?
description.vi: Đến từ tác giả của Sevens và Otomob Liam Sera Banfield là một người chuyển sinh. Cậu được tái sinh vào một vũ trụ giả tưởng mà ở đó cả khoa học lẫn ma thuật đều phát triển. Ở kiếp trước, cậu đã mất tất cả để rồi chêt trong tuyệt vọng: -Nếu đó là những gì nhận được khi sống tử tế, tôi thà sống buông thả. -Ta sẽ trở thành một chúa tể độc ác! Liệu con đường trở thành chúa tể độc ác của cậu có được như ý muốn?
description.pt-br: Liam Sera Canfield é um reincarnator. Ele reencarnou em um universo fantasioso de espada e feitiçaria, onde a civilização já avançou para o espaço sideral. A história se passa em um império intergaláctico, assim como uma space opera, com armas humanoides e batalhas de naves espaciais. Liam, que incarnou em uma família de aristocratas em uma sociedade monárquica, tem a ambição de se tornar um lorde maligno. Em sua vida anterior, liam infelizmente acabou perdendo tudo e morrendo em desespero. “ É tolice viver pelos outros.” “ Eu irei viver por mim mesmo” Com esses sentimentos no peito ele começa sua segunda vida, só que ao invés disso ele é idolatrado como um virtuoso líder por causa da diferença de valores. Será que Liam conseguirá se tornar um lorde maligno?

title.en: Help! I Had Transmigrated and My Snake Husband Pampered Me Too Much

altTitles.zh: Jiù Mìng! Chuān Yuè Shòu Shì Shé Fū Chāo Chǒng Wǒ!
救命！穿越兽世蛇夫超宠我！

altTitles.zh-ro: Jiu Ming! Chuan Yue Shou Shi She Fu Chao Chong Wo!

description.en:
Lu Ling transmigrated into the Beast World novel that he had just read halfway through before going to bed, and became a cannon fodder, deer beast.

The current plot is that after Lu Linggang agreed to Snake Ying's "courtship" request, he would use his fiancé Snake Ying to get the winter resources.

After Lu Ling transmigrated, she couldn't bear Snake Shadow to experience the plot of being "betrayed by herself" and "ruthlessly abandoned" again.

Although Snake Shadow's departure may lead to her failure in the future, Lu Ling still decided to "break off the marriage", but she was helpless every time.

What will happen to Lu Ling?
description.fr:
Lu Ling s'est fait transmigré dans le monde d'un livre alors qu'elle était en train de le lire avant d'aller se coucher et après cela elle devenu une biche !

Elle est arrivé au moment de l'histoire où Lu Ling a accepté de devenir la partenaire de She Ying pour récupéré ses ressources pour l'hiver.

Après avoir transmigré Lu Ling n'a pas supporté de faire subir ça a She Ying et donc elle assez de s'éloigner de lui.
Meme si le fait de quitter She Ying, pourrait mener à sa fin, Lu Ling a quand même décidé de se séparer de lui...

Que va t-il se passé et arrivé a Lu Ling dans ce nouveau monde ? Va t-elle rester avec She Ying ? Comment va t-elle vivre dans ce nouveau monde ?
description.zh: 鹿灵穿越到自己睡前刚看了一半的兽世小说中，成了一只炮灰鹿兽女配。目前的剧情正是鹿灵刚答应蛇影的“求偶”请求后，马上要利用未婚夫蛇影过冬的剧情。鹿灵穿越后，不忍蛇影再次经历被“自己背叛”和“无情抛弃”的剧情，虽然蛇影的离开可能会导致自己过冬失败，但鹿灵还是决定要“退婚”，无奈每次都被打断。

altTitles.es: La Chica Malvada Se Convierte En Emperatriz

description.en:
The Goddess of War died with grievances. Now after being reborn as Ye Weiyun she is on her way to start a new and happy life.   
  
What revenge? What scum? Violence should be fought with violence!   
  
I will become a rich woman, and build my own harem.   
  
"In the past I got bullied and never resisted. Now, take a good look at the queen I have become."

Alternative Raws: [Kuaikan](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/5975), [BiliBili](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc27719)

altTitles.ja: レベル200最強盗賊の覚醒～終末世界で暴れ狂ってやる～

description.en: A storm of the universe brought species mutations. The poison, undead, giants and monsters in the city roared as they waved their weapons. As the beasts in the woods fought over territorial rights, humans, too, awakened an ability known as star power… Zhou Zheng, without star power, traversed to this apocalyptic world. Using the abilities of the thief character in the game, he destroys the darkness and fog, seeking supreme power!
description.fr:
Un mouvement dans l'univers a apporté des mutations au niveau des espèces vivantes. Un poison, des morts vivants, des géants et des monstres rugissent dans la ville en agitant leurs armes. Alors que des bêtes dans les bois se battent pour des territoires, certains humains éveillent une capacité spéciale connue sous le nom de pouvoir des étoiles... Zhou Zheng, déficient de ce pouvoir, va traverser ce nouveau monde post apocalyptique.
Utilisant ses capacités de voleur issue d'un autre jeu, il détruit ténèbres et brouillard, à la recherche du pouvoir suprême !
description.zh: 一场宇宙风暴带来了物种的变异。城市中的毒尸巨怪，挥动着战斧咆哮。丛林中的异兽们，争夺着领地的主权。人类也觉醒了一种名为星力的异能……没有星力的周正穿越到这个末世。利用游戏中盗贼的角色能力，他将撕毁黑暗迷雾，追逐至高的力量！

altTitles.zh: 我成了反派大佬的小娇妻？！

altTitles.zh-hk: 我成了反派大佬的小嬌妻？！

altTitles.ja: 私は悪役の甘えん坊妻になりました

altTitles.zh-ro: Wo Cheng Le Fan Pai Da Lao De Xiao Jiao Qi?!

description.en: The dainty flower idol Chen Cong Rong unluckily fell into a trap and awoke to a stunning naked man in her bed! Hahaha, is it okay to be with such a beautiful man? Hang on… Are you telling me I've switched places with the toxic, evil, and manipulative side character who won’t even survive 20% of the plot?! No, I'm definitely not ready to die!! Watch as I keep on living my ideal life!

title.en: Mezase Gouka Kyakusen!! ~Sen Shokan Skill De Isekai Rich Life Wo Te Ni Irero~

altTitles.ja: めざせ豪華客船!!　～船召喚スキルで異世界リッチライフを手に入れろ～

altTitles.ko: 노려라 호화객선!! 배 소환 스킬로 이세계 부자 라이프를 손에 넣어라

altTitles.en: Aim for a Luxury Cruise Ship!!: Obtain a Rich Life in Another World with a Ship Summoning Skill

description.en: After falling into the ocean, Wataru Toyoumi, finds himself reincarnated in another world! Armed with a skill to allow him to summon boats, he plans to get rich and live a happy life aboard his very own luxury liner.

title.en: Yuusha-sama wa Houshuu ni Hitozuma wo go Kibou desu

altTitles.ja: 勇者さまは報酬に人妻をご希望です

altTitles.ja-ro: Yuusha-sama wa Houshuu ni Hitozuma o go Kiboudesu

altTitles.en: The Hero Wants a Married Woman as a Reward

description.en:
The hero, Chloe, is a strange hero who demands a bounty when saving people. And what makes it different is the prize... He only likes married women, so he demands the prettiest Milf in town.

**"If you want me to save the city, give me your most beautiful married woman!"**

 A unique erotic fantasy story created by a hero!
description.id:
Pahlawan ini keji...!!  Pahlawan, Chloe, adalah pahlawan aneh yang menuntut hadiah saat menyelamatkan orang. Dan yang membuatnya berbeda adalah hadiahnya...Dia hanya senang dengan wanita yang sudah menikah, jadi dia menuntut Milf yang paling cantik di kota. 

"Jika kau ingin aku menyelamatkan kota, berikan aku milf yang paling cantik" 

Sebuah cerita unik fantasi erotis yang dibuat oleh pahlawan!
description.ja: この勇者、下劣ッ…！！勇者・クロエは人々を救う際に報酬を要求する、異質な勇者だった。そして彼が異質なのはその報酬であった…彼は人妻にしか興奮しない為、その町で一番美しい人妻を要求するのであった。「町を救ってほしければ、一番美しい人妻を寄越せ」異色の勇者がおりなすエロファンタジー！

altTitles.ja: あやかしの葬儀屋

description.en: The death of an Ayakashi is unclean - It is an impure occurence that corrodes the land, and occasionally gives birth to monsters. This is the story of the "Ayakashi undertakers" who exorcise these impurities and watch over the deaths of these fantastical beings.
description.ja: あやかしの死を見つめる追悼奇譚開幕。あやかしの死に、穢れあり。それは土地を蝕み、時に化け者を生む、妖しき死の名残り…。あやかし殺しの罪人・八重波は、穢れを祓う葬儀屋の元で働くこととなり…。人とあやかし、生者と死者。

title.en: My Dearest Self With Malice Aforethought

altTitles.ru: Мое дорогое Я со злым умыслом

altTitles.ja-ro: Shinai naru Boku e Satsui o Komete

altTitles.ja: 親愛なる僕へ殺意をこめて

description.de:
Auf den ersten Blick scheint Eiji ein ganz normaler Student zu sein, doch er hat ein Geheimnis: sein verstorbener Vater war ein berüchtigter Serienmörder, der für seine extreme Grausamkeit bekannt war.
Eines Tages wacht Eiji neben einem schönen fremden Mädchen auf, das anscheinend in ihn verliebt ist und behauptet, seine Freundin zu sein, doch eigenartigerweise kann er sich nicht an sie erinnern. Die letzten Tage scheinen wie aus seinem Gedächtnis gelöscht, und es fühlt sich an, als hätte jemand anders die Kontrolle übernommen. Zur selben Zeit findet die örtliche Polizei eine aufs Übelste verstümmelte Leiche, und für sie besteht kein Zweifel: Eijis Vater ist zurück... doch kann das wirklich sein?
description.en: Urashima Eiji, a college student, goes to sleep after a fun drinking night with his friends. When he wakes up he discovers a beautiful girl next to him who treats him as if they are in a loving relationship. Later, Eiji finds out that 4 days have passed since he went out with his crew. What did he do during all that time and why does he have no memory of it? By confronting that reality, he will be caught in tragedy…
description.ne: एइजी, कलेज उमेरको कुमारले कुनै दिन प्रेमिका हुने सपना देख्छ... अनि एक दिन आफ्नो "प्रेमिका" को साथ आफ्नो ओछ्यानमा उठ्छ! त्यति मात्र होइन, उसको साथीले उसलाई बताउँछ कि ऊ झगडामा परेको छ ... र त्यो तीन दिन बितिसक्यो जुन एइजीलाई याद छैन? के अँध्यारो रहस्यहरू लुकाइरहेका छ ... एइजी आफैले?
description.ru:
Урашима Эйджи, студент колледжа, засыпает после веселой ночи с друзьями. Когда он просыпается, он обнаруживает рядом с собой красивую девушку, которая ведет себя с ним, как со своим парнем. Позже Эйджи узнает, что с того вечера прошло 3 дня. Что он делал все это время и почему не помнит ничего об этом? Столкнувшись с реальностью, он попадет в трагедию…  
  
Itou Shouta's Twitter: [@shota\_itooooo](https://twitter.com/shota_itooooo)
description.vi: Urashima Eiji, một sinh viên đại học, đi ngủ sau một đêm uống rượu vui vẻ với bạn bè. Khi tỉnh dậy, anh phát hiện ra một cô gái xinh đẹp bên cạnh, người đối xử với anh như thể họ đang trong một mối quan hệ yêu đương. Sau đó, anh phát hiện ra rằng 4 ngày đã trôi qua kể từ khi anh đi ra ngoài cùng với đám bạn của mình. Anh ấy đã làm gì trong suốt thời gian đó và tại sao anh ấy không có ký ức về nó?. Khi đối mặt với thực tế đó, anh sẽ bị cuốn vào bi kịch...

title.en: Koishita Hito wa, Imouto no Kawari ni Shindekure to Itta.: Imouto to Kekkon shita Kataomoi Aite ga Naze Imasara Watashi no Moto ni? to Omottara @COMIC

altTitles.ja: 恋した人は、妹の代わりに死んでくれと言った。―妹と結婚した片思い相手がなぜ今さら私のもとに?と思ったら―@COMIC

altTitles.en: The Person I Loved Asked Me to Die in My Sister's Stead
The Person I Loved Asked Me to Die in My Younger Sister's Place

altTitles.zh: 我爱的人、让我代替妹妹去死

description.en:
In place of her sister, Wisteria took on the job of becoming a guardian of a poisonous otherworld. One day, a man who resembled her first love dropped out of the sky. His name was Lloyd. To her surprise, he was the son of her first love!

 To win the hand of the princess, he has come to ask for Wisteria's partner, Saltis, a sentient holy sword. Having survived in the other world frozen in time, Wisteria easily defeated Lloyd and told him to go home... But despite her best efforts at persuasion, Lloyd refused to leave. 

"Please take me as your apprentice, until I get strong enough to defeat you!" 

So began a one-sided relationship between master and apprentice. Will her time, which has remained frozen for so long, begin to move again? A master-student love fantasy between a lonely former noble lady and a prodigy prince!

altTitles.ja: 不揃いの連理

description.en:
From Newtype site:  
  
Our ages are different, our ways of life are different, everything is different. But… I just want to be with you!  
Because I've never been in a miserable, tragic romance, I can say that unrequited love is fine…  
I don't know why I fell in love with this person…it's a mystery!  
  
They have different personalities, different ages, different ways of thinking, different looks, different everything.  
This is the story of girls who clumsily make up for what's lacking in the other.  
  
T/N:  
These are side stories. Not a rewrite of the original serialized twitter comic. It builds up on what happens in the main series in a longer format. It eventually merges with the main series in the volume edition.
   
The kind of stories these are is all in the title!  
  
不揃 (fuzoroi) means uneven, irregular, but also incomplete. 連理 (renri) is "entwined relationship".  

So, these are stories of intimate relationships between "incomplete" girls that somehow complete each other, against all odds.

altTitles.ja: ちがう宮原おまえじゃない！

altTitles.ja-ro: Chigau Miyahara Omae ja nai!

altTitles.zh: 我要找的、才不是宫原你啦！

altTitles.ja: ちが宮

altTitles.ja-ro: ChigaMiya

description.en:
The manga centers on Arima, a boy who has a crush on a girl named Yukihira. But every time he tries to make a move to get closer to Yukihira, his other friend Miyahara just happens to be in the scene and will always mistakenly think that Arima is making a move on her. ([ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/news/2022-11-11/midori-obiya-launches-new-manga-mini-series/.191780))
___
**Alt Official Raw:** [Young Jump!](https://ynjn.jp/title/7831)
description.ja: 憧れの女子”雪比良さん”と仲良くなるべく奮闘する有馬！ でもなぜか、いつもイイところであらわれるのは…。 末永〜く見守りたい！中学生３人の青春ラブコメ、ここに開幕っ！
description.vi: Câu chuyện diễn biến xung quanh Arima - một cậu bạn sơ trung phải lòng một bạn nữ cùng lớp tên Yukihira. Nhưng mỗi khi cậu ấy chuẩn bị tiến gần hơn với Yukihara thì cô bạn thuở nhỏ Miyahara lại bất chợt xuất hiện lúc nào chẳng hay làm cho mọi người lầm tưởng rằng Arima đang nhắm đến cô bạn đó hơn là Yukihara.
description.pt-br: Arima, é um garoto apaixonado por uma garota chamada Yukihira. Mas toda vez que ele tenta ficar mais próximo de Yukihira, sua outra amiga, Miyahara simplesmente entra em cena e sempre pensa erroneamente que Arima está fazendo seus movimentos por ela.

altTitles.ja: 食べてもおいしくありません

altTitles.th: กินผมไปก็ไม่อร่อยหรอกครับ

altTitles.zh: 你要吃了我吗、可是我并不美味

description.en: A world where demons prevail and humans are rare. Hiyori, a human, is considered to be delicious to demons. However, his classmate, Hodaka, a pushy big-horned demon, found out his secret. On top of that, he kissed and tasted him…Charming a demon—a troublesome situation?! Surrendering to one's instinct and pleasure leads to…
description.fr:
Un monde où les démons règnent et où les humains sont rares. Hiyori, un humain,
est considéré comme délicieux pour les démons. Cependant, son camarade de classe, Hodaka, un démon à grosses cornes arriviste, a découvert son secret. En plus de ça, il l’a embrassé et goûté… Avec une constitution spécial qui attire les démon, est-il dans une situation critique !? L’endroit où l’instinct auquel on ne peut résister et le plaisir se rejoignent…

title.en: The Villainess and Miss Demon Lord

altTitles.ru: Злодейская дочь и мисс Королева демон

altTitles.vi: Thiên kim phản diện và tiểu thư ma vương

altTitles.en: The Daughter of Evil & Miss Devil

altTitles.ja: 魔法が使えない悪役令嬢に転生しました

description.en:
Two girls, hand-in-hand, cross over to another world, into a magical academy set in a melodramatic Western fantasy novel. They transform into two people completely unrecognizable to each other: One is a rich villainess who is incapable of using any kind of magic, while the other is a young girl extremely talented in the field of magic, who's said to be the reincarnation of the Demon Lord. Originally set to save the world, the two of them unexpectedly fall in love.

"Male lead, female lead, may you two live a long and happy life together, forever. I, the villainess, am going to elope with Miss Demon Lord!"
Chapter 8 in Naver's 2023 Rookie Short Story Collection (2023 루키 단편선).

In a world governed by Chi and dimensional hierarchies, Shinra Yamada’s life changes when he consumes a mysterious heart, allowing the entity Akuma Obscura to possess him.
Joined by Espertha Yakuzu, a vessel for dangerous energy, and Noboru Kojima, a cunning wind Chi user, Shinra embarks on a journey of self-discovery and cosmic ascension.

As he rises through six tiers of existence, from mortal to godlike, Shinra battles clans, gods, and abstract beings while uncovering the secrets of Chi and his connection to the multiverse.
Tai Chi Convergence is a tale of power, sacrifice, and the struggle to reclaim hope in a universe teetering on chaos.

(Source: MangaPlus for Creators)

altTitles.ja-ro: Akuryou - Shutoheru
Shuto Heru
Shutohel

altTitles.ja: 悪霊 シュトヘル

description.en:
Beginning of the 13th century, Western Xia state in Chinese mainland. 
In those days existed a woman warrior named Shut Hell, the Evil One, feared even by the Mongols, reputed the strongest army in history. 
At first she was just a normal Tangut soldier, but after coming close to death so many times she found a superhuman strength in herself. 
On the other side Yurul, a young Mongol prince, is fascinated by the Tangut, his enemies' writing script, and is worried for their future…
Centuries later a Japanese high school student named Shudo is haunted by a vivid dream of a battlefield...
Is there some sort of bound between these completely different lives ? Will they manage to overcome the obstacles surrounding them ?


- **2012 Osamu Tezuka Cultural Prize (New Creator) winner**
description.pt-br: Um Jovem chamado Sudou desperta em uma de suas vidas passadas onde ele era uma guerreira Xia chamada Shut Hell a maligna, temida até pelos Mongóis de Genghis Khan que estão unindo forças para acabar com a dinastia Xia Ocidental. a história ocorre no Século 13 onde a Maligna junto com a principe Yurul se esforçam para preservar Xia e sua cultura e escritas.

altTitles.ja: 空をまとって

altTitles.ja-ro: Sora o Matotte

description.en:
Haro Ogawa, a high school student, is also a self-taught oil painter who is trying to paint the ultimate nude. 
After an unexpected encounter with an elusive "witch", he sets his sights on applying to art school... 
The mystery that resides in the human body, the ultimate "beauty", will be painted on canvas! 
A skin-colored coming-of-age drama!
description.ja: 「俺もいつかこんなヌードを描きたい――」　幼少時に見た絵画、「魔女のヌード」に魅入られた高校生・小川波路（おがわはろ）。日々、独学でヌードを描く彼の前に現れたのは、「魔女のヌード」に描かれた女性に瓜二つの美女、神生伶だった。ハロは思わず、伶にヌードモデルになってほしいと頼みこむが…!?　目指すはヌードで藝大合格!!

altTitles.ja: 馬姫様と鹿王子

altTitles.ja-ro: Uma Himesama to Shika Ouji

altTitles.en: The Horse Princess and The Deer Prince

description.en:
Mahoro is a high school girl who loves her teacher.
She studied hard to get her teacher to like her, but as a result, she is now a college student making her debut in a rural area, and is at a loss for what to do with her life for the first time!
What will Mahoro see in the ancient city of Nara?

altTitles.tr: Cross-dressing yaparken, yakışıklı bir adam beni yürüttü

altTitles.ru: Пока я был переодет в женскую одежду, ко мне пристал красивый парень!

altTitles.zh: 女装上街闲逛被帅哥搭讪了

altTitles.ja: イケメン女子と女装男子

altTitles.en: While Cross-Dressing, I Was Hit on by a Handsome Guy!

altTitles.ja-ro: Josou Shite Machi ni Kuridashitara Ikemen ni Nanpa Sareru Manga

description.en: While cross-dressing, I was hit on by a handsome guy, except she wasn't actually a handsome guy!
description.tr: Ceza olarak crossdressing yaparken yakışıklı bir adamla karşılaştım ve işi pişirdi.
description.pt-br: Por causa de uma brincadeira eu acabei tendo de me vestir de menina, então, sai às ruas, e nesse dia, acabei conhecendo alguém e minha vida está para mudar.

altTitles.ja-ro: 透明と残像

description.en:
Shoko, an aspiring artist, made her living drawing portraits.
One day, a young man wrapped in bandages asked her to draw his self-portrait, but as it turned out, he was actually an invisible man...

(Source: MangaPlus)

title.en: Seitokai ni mo Ana wa Aru!

altTitles.ja: 生徒会にも穴はある!

altTitles.en: There is Also a Hole in the Student Organization!
Even the Student Council has Holes

altTitles.vi: Hội học sinh cũng lắm trò vui!

description.en: When it comes to the face of this student organization, it's a little weird, like a fool, scary, or moody. However, mysterious and futuristic days that seem strangely cute pass by.
description.ja: この生徒会の面子ときたら、あほの子だったり、恐ろしかったり、むっつりだったり、ちょっと変！ でも、それがなんだか、妙に可愛く思える今日この頃……。

title.en: Emiya-san Chi no Kyou no Gohan

altTitles.vi: Bữa ăn hôm nay của nhà Emiya

altTitles.en: Today's Menu for the Emiya Family

altTitles.ja: 衛宮さんちの今日のごはん

description.en:
"Fulfilling meal…a familiar view.”

In this story, Fate and food meet in a delicious and gentle world. It’s nothing but an ordinary meal scene… Delicious meals are served at the Emiya’s dinner table every day, through spring, summer, fall and winter. – Let's see… what's for dinner today?
description.ja: 衛宮士郎が自慢の手料理で、冬木の住人やサーヴァントたちをほっこりさせちゃいます！ 詳細なレシピも付いて、だれでも士郎の手料理を同調開始（トレース・オン）！

title.en: The Exiled Heavy Knight Knows How to Game the System

altTitles.ja: 追放された転生重騎士はゲーム知識で無双する

altTitles.ja-ro: Tsuihou Sareta Tensei Juu Kishi wa Game Chishiki de Musou Suru

description.en:
"You good-for-nothing bastard. You are the son of a Sword Saint, yet you dare pull such a defective Class?!"

During the〈Divine Blessing Ceremony〉of the 15-year-old Elma who came from a lineage of Sword Saints, he had manifested a commonly deemed defective class known as the Heavy Knight. He had been deprived of his position as the next head of the Edvan Household and was then exiled. The Heavy Knight class had an unbalanced status and useless skills, to top it off, it was even said to be a class cowardly and indolent people have.

But, Elma knew better—that this world was the world of the game he had used to play before—and that the Heavy Knight class was the strongest class to exist. Elma made full use of the knowledge he had in his previous life and began his efficient walkthrough of the world he was reincarnated into.
description.ja:
「役立たずめ……剣聖の息子でありながら、こんな大ハズレを引こうとは！」

十五歳の〈加護の儀〉。剣聖の血筋であるエルマは、典型的なハズレクラスである重騎士を発現し、次期当主の座を奪われて追放されてしまう。重騎士は偏ったステータスに、使い所のないスキル。挙げ句に臆病で怠惰な者が得るクラスだとまでいわれていた。だが、エルマは知っていた。この世界は彼が遊び尽くしたゲームの世界であり――重騎士こそが、最強のクラスであることを。エルマは生前の知識をフル活用し、この世界の効率的な攻略を始めるのだった。
